au.com.agic.apptesting.steps

Class TabAndWindowStepDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.agic.apptesting.steps.TabAndWindowStepDefinition

  • @Component
public class TabAndWindowStepDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains Gherkin step definitions for working with tabs and windows

    • Method Detail

      • switchTabs

        @When(value="I switch to tab \"(\\d+)\"$")
public void switchTabs(java.lang.String tabIndex)
        Switchs to the specified tab. This is useful when you open a link that opens in a new window.
        Parameters:
        tabIndex - The index of the new tab. Usually 1 (the original tab will be 0)

      • switchWindows

        @When(value="I switch to the new window")
public void switchWindows()
        Switchs to the specified window. This is useful when you open a link that opens in a new window.

      • closeWindow

        @When(value="I close the current window")
public void closeWindow()
        Switchs to the specified window. This is useful when you open a link that opens in a new window.

      • maximiseWindow

        @When(value="I maximi(?:s|z)e the window")
public void maximiseWindow()
        Maximise the browser window

      • setWindowSize

        @When(value="I set the window size to \"(\\d+)x(\\d+)\"")
public void setWindowSize(java.lang.Integer width,
                                                                                    java.lang.Integer height)
        Sets the dimensions of the browser window
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the browser window
        height - The height of the browser window
